newsitem.title: USA: Prevention Productions names new CEO.
newsitem.headline: Prevention Productions names new CEO.

text.p: Prevention Productions Ltd said on Tuesday it named Russell Van de Casteele president and chief executive officer.

The company also said the majority of shareholders approved a reverse split of the issued and outstanding shares from 30.3 million shares to 1.52 million shares. The reverse split took effect December 6, it said.

The company also said it would issue 3.3 million shares of its restricted stock after the reverse split to Casteele, in exchange for $0.01 per share and the assignment of a contract between Casteele and Nutrimist Laboratories Inc.
